# LLMs.txt - Chess Tracker Stack Reference

This file contains concentrated knowledge about the external libraries and APIs used in this project.

## Core Stack

### React 19
- https://react.dev/reference/react
- Using React 19 with new features (use hook, etc.)

### React Router v7
- https://reactrouter.com/en/main
- File-based routing pattern used
- `<Outlet />` for nested routes
- `useNavigate()` for programmatic navigation

### TanStack Query (React Query) v5
- https://tanstack.com/query/latest
- Docs: https://tanstack.com/query/latest/docs/framework/react/overview

Key patterns used:
```typescript
// Basic query
const { data, isLoading, error } = useQuery({
  queryKey: ['key', param],
  queryFn: () => fetchData(param),
  enabled: !!param,  // Conditional fetching
});

// Query with cache control
useQuery({
  queryKey: ['key'],
  queryFn: fetchData,
  staleTime: Infinity,  // Never auto-refetch
  gcTime: Infinity,     // Keep in cache forever
  initialData: cached,  // Start with cached value
});
```

### TailwindCSS v4
- https://tailwindcss.com/docs
- Using @tailwindcss/vite plugin (not PostCSS)
- Custom utilities defined in src/index.css using @layer utilities

### Vite
- https://vitejs.dev/
- Dev server: `npm run dev` (port 5173)
- Build: `npm run build`
- Environment variables: `VITE_*` prefix required

## APIs

### Google Drive API v3
- https://developers.google.com/drive/api/v3/reference
- Auth: OAuth 2.0 Bearer token

Key endpoints:
```
GET /drive/v3/files?q={query}           # Search files
GET /drive/v3/files/{fileId}?alt=media  # Download content
PATCH /upload/drive/v3/files/{fileId}   # Update file
POST /upload/drive/v3/files             # Create file
```

### Google OAuth 2.0
- https://developers.google.com/identity/protocols/oauth2
- Using implicit grant flow (response_type=token)
- Scopes: drive.file, drive.readonly

### USCF Ratings API (MUIR)
- Endpoint: https://ratings-api.uschess.org/api/v1/members/{id}
- No auth required (public API)
- Returns JSON with ratings array

Response structure:
```json
{
  "id": "30352946",
  "firstName": "Name",
  "lastName": "Name",
  "ratings": [
    { "rating": 1234, "ratingSystem": "R", "isProvisional": false }
  ],
  "stateRep": "CA",
  "expirationDate": "2025-12-31"
}
```

Rating systems: R=Regular, Q=Quick, B=Blitz

## Vercel Serverless Functions
- https://vercel.com/docs/functions/serverless-functions
- Files in /api folder
- TypeScript with @vercel/node types

```typescript
import type { VercelRequest, VercelResponse } from '@vercel/node';

export default async function handler(req: VercelRequest, res: VercelResponse) {
  res.setHeader('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', '*');
  return res.status(200).json({ data: 'value' });
}
```
